Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Arrow shafts
Description: Arrows with a rush shaft at the extremity of which were attached nine fragments of various sizes (between 30 and 4 cm). Some of the shafts still bear traces of the adhesive used to fix the head to the shaft where a small thread would consolidate the whole.
